title: An Interview with Pat Vines: The Shrine of Remembrance
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner

abstract: I remember going there during the war years as a teenager and being impressed by the significance of the Shrine.
description: After Pat Vines returns from the war as a Commander of the Australian Navy, one of her senior navy officers recommends her to the Shrine of Remembrance Trustees, which she joins. She tells of her time as a Trustee for the Shrine.
